name: logseq-db
title: Logseq DB
description: Quick capture notes and search your Logseq database graphs
author: joenewton

commands.name: quick-capture
commands.title: Quick Capture
commands.description: Quickly add a note to today's journal

commands.name: add-task
commands.title: Add Task
commands.description: Create a new task with properties

preferences.name: graphPath
preferences.title: Graph Path
preferences.description: Full path to your Logseq DB graph (e.g., ~/logseq/graphs/my-graph)

preferences.name: apiToken
preferences.title: API Server Token
preferences.description: Optional: API token for HTTP server (Settings > AI > MCP Server in Logseq)

preferences.name: quickCaptureTag
preferences.title: Quick Capture Tag
preferences.description: Optional tag to add to quick captures (without #)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
